publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4468 David Whitton: East Dunbartonshire Mini Water Polo—That the Parliament congratulates the six schools in East Dunbartonshire, Balmuildy, Wester Cleddens, Lenzie Moss, Meadowburn, St Joseph’s and Torrance Primary, on reaching the finals of the Scottish Swimming and Kellogg’s Swim Active mini-polo finals; notes that Balmuildy Primary 5 and Meadowburn Primary 6 won the gold medals; also notes that the Kellogg’s Swim Active initiative has been a great success in East Dunbartonshire, introducing mini-polo to over 2,500 children in the course of this academic year, and hopes that it can be rolled out across other local authorities.
S3M-4468 East Dunbartonshire Mini Water Polo (lodged on 19 June 2009) Mary Mulligan*, Des McNulty*, Bill Kidd*, Jamie McGrigor*, Karen Whitefield*, Hugh Henry*, Jackie Baillie*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-4468 East Dunbartonshire Mini Water Polo (lodged on 19 June 2009) Trish Godman*
S3M-4468 East Dunbartonshire Mini Water Polo (lodged on 19 June 2009) Gil Paterson*, Stuart McMillan*
